name: Php server monitor fork2
short_description:
Description

The new version adds ability to scan and validate database backup files (bdd base de données) or any files.

For example: you have a whole bunch of servers and you back up the data to your "backup" server, well you just tell php server monitor fork2 to look at these files, give a link to the file that the server can read and it will validate to see when the last time you checked the file and will do a simple check to see if the filesize has changed since you last checked. 

This plus all the same features for the regular server monitor plus more.

In addition to all this: PHP Server Monitor (is a script that checks whether the servers on your list are up and running on the selected ports.
It comes with a web based user interface where you can add and remove servers or websites from the MySQL database,
and you can manage users for each server with a mobile number and email address.
On the "Add server" page, you can choose
whether it's a "service" or a "website"
summary: Summer 2013 fork of php server monitor
